Directions: In a large bowl, combine corn bread mix and brown sugar. Combine eggs and milk; stir into dry ingredients until moistened. Stir in corn and hot dogs (batter will be thin).
Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups three-fourths full  Bake at 400 degrees F for 14-18 minutes or until golden brown. Serve immediately or refrigerate.
Ingredients: 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
